attributes.action: Disagree with decision about the legislation of the VisaControls over the stay of visitors from overseas to have a 3 month visa only.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please can you tell why you have done this for only 3 months the legislation for visitors from overseas.
Please e-mail me and let me know the reasons for this decision which I totally disagree with, although I am a British Citizen having been here from 1972 in UK and lived all my life over here in UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
